title: Apple iMovie 3.0 introduces Storyboards and Magic Movie
content:
Apple tries to help its users develop their talents and skills through free software aimed at beginners. For example, iPad and Mac users can take advantage of Swift Playgrounds to learn the basis of coding in Swift. They can then build more advanced projects on Xcode — once they’re confident enough. Other examples include GarageBand

The post Apple iMovie 3.0 introduces Storyboards and Magic Movie appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Apple has finally released iMovie 3.0 to iPhone and iPad users. This major version introduces Storyboards and Magic Movie.
